function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of contact with nature in the built environment","Impact":"Reduced well-being and mental health, decreased productivity","Mitigation":"Incorporating biophilic design principles, increasing access to natural light and green spaces","Technologies":"Biophilic design, daylighting systems, green walls","People":"Inhabitants of built environments","Owner":"Architects, developers, and building owners"},{"Description":"Criticism of 'green-washing' or 'placebo' strategies related to nature in architecture","Impact":"Skepticism and mistrust, failure to achieve sustainable goals","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough investigations, promoting transparency and evidence-based design","Technologies":"Data analytics, evidence-based design tools","People":"Architects, sustainability consultants","Owner":"Architectural firms, sustainability organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the emotional needs of humans for interactions with the natural environment in the building environment","Impact":"Emotional distress, dissatisfaction with the built environment","Mitigation":"Educating architects and designers on biophilic design principles, conducting user surveys and studies","Technologies":"Biophilic design software, user experience research tools","People":"Architects, designers, building occupants","Owner":"Educational institutions, architectural firms"}]}
